name: Overview
data: [{"id":"414dd2c0-c76e-4418-87a3-a335292c95c4","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"48f5f101-9315-4aa3-8b05-7e2b6856363a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Explanation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2c209b46-4d4d-4131-94d8-b69e16cf2734","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method is the main execution point of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Simple","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter and is responsible for converting the raw output of the code generator into a clean, predictable structure. Its goal is not to alter the meaning of the data, but to ensure that the output is concrete, stable, and easy to work with.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"28305f26-bc05-4b21-8f61-ac199c7dbe5d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When called, the method first invokes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.cg_generator.output()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is expected to return a collection—typically a dictionary—where each key represents a node and each value is an iterable associated with that node. These iterables may be generators, sets, or other non-list types that are not guaranteed to be reusable or serializable.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"46b5de4a-562a-4c2a-805b-1ba5a6fadc61","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The method then creates a new dictionary, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"output_cg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and iterates over each node in the generator’s output. For every node, the corresponding value is explicitly converted into a list using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list(output[node])","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This step fully materializes the data, ensuring that:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"548f0051-def9-4d34-bee6-287732882a6b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Lazy iterables are evaluated only once.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e4a7493b-7d68-48ae-b2c0-0cd72315421b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The data can be safely reused without side effects.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7fa8864a-42af-45e8-9163-0da553df586e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The result can be easily serialized (e.g., to JSON) or inspected during debugging.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e7263fb5-4244-44cb-a916-6c9d96145fa5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By constructing a new dictionary rather than modifying the original output, the method preserves the integrity of the generator’s internal state. Finally, the normalized dictionary—mapping each node to a concrete list of values—is returned as the final formatted result.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"12c064f3-a407-4d18-b5ad-b44fc239bde3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
